input.sentences: there was a murder in this forest yesterday | the police came to the only person they knew who could help | me .
i seem to be the only one around here who is capable | this evil doer will be brought to justice .

sniff to the right | i know exactly where he 's hiding .
this may get bloody | but i know what to do | stay back camera-guy | we do n't need any other casualties on our hands .
